channel.title: Interview with Ellen McLain (voice actor of GLaDOS)
channel.description:
I want to bring to attention to you all for the recent voice interview with Ellen McLain (the voice actor of GLaDOS for both Portal games, the team fortress 2 announcer and also half-life 2's overwatch voice). I think this will be of interest to mostly Portal fans.The inerview is around 45 minutes long and done by a guy named caboos15 (you probably never heard of him), there is also a suprise guest, her husband John Patrick Lowrie (tf2 sniper voice actor).
I did this thread becouse i want more people to see this since it's a good interview and it doesn't have enough views.
Here you go lads: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lR2UyCwtj-U...feature=related[/url]
Caboos15 also interviewed alot of other cool people, so you can check his other videos if you like

item.title: Interview with Ellen McLain (voice actor of GLaDOS)
item.dc:creator: Charli
item.description:
really interesting interview, thanks for sharing!
